TopicTitle: Shading on kerbals changes each time you enter vab

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 Home 22H2 22621.2428 | CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-10400 CPU @ 2.90GHz 2.90 GHz | GPU: Nvidia GTX 1660 Super | RAM: 16 GB

 

I was about to launch a rocket, when I realized I had accidentally removed the stabilizers. I had sent the image of Ferdock Kerman to the Intercept Games KSP2 General, went to the launchpad, realized the stabilizers came off, reverted to VAB, and decided to send a picture of the crew to the KSP2 general chat. I then noticed that the shading on Ferdock was different, and the shading and skin tone on Tim and Mark J also appeared to be different, as well as some kerbals in the KSC. (I.e Tim looked paler and mark more vibrant, as well as the shading was a bit different)

Considering how minor this bug is, I fully expect it to not be fixed for a while since you have more important things to work on, I just kinda noticed it after reverting a flight
